title: Want To Jam With 'Jiju' Nick Jonas? This Video Will Sure Make You ‘Jealous’!
description: So, recently Vineet Singh Hukmani, who is the managing director and CEO of 94.3 Radio One India, paid a tribute to the newly-weds. Singing with Nick Jonas via Smule, a music app that allows you to sing along with another user, he describes it as absolutely super experience. Take a look!
